response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $1,200,000 to us, reflecting its unparalleled quality and unique features. We are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000, a significant discount that reflects our commitment to making this remarkable product accessible to those who appreciate its true worth. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this masterpiece into your possession.", "product_price": 1100000}
